Complete Packs.name: Bricks Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Randomizes the texture for Bricks in whole Blocks, Stairs and Walls. Gives Slabs an assortment of randomized horizontal bricks so that they can be used ontop of windows or arches for extra flavor.

requiresefr

incompat{Randomized Bricks}

Complete Packs.name: Podzol Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Mixes and rotates both Podzol textures to appear even more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

incompat{Rotated Podzol}
incompat{Rotated Brown Podzol}

Complete Packs.name: Cake Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Mixes and rotates both Cake textures to appear even more random.

incompat{Rotated Cake}

Complete Packs.name: Pumpkin Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
A complete overhaul for Pumpkins and Jack o'Lanterns. Includes randomized faces, rotated top textures, fixed and rotated bottom textures and mirrored side textures.

overridemaster{Randomized Pumpkins}

Complete Packs.name: Sandstone Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
A complete overhaul for Sandstone. Includes normal Sandstone and its Slabs, Stairs and Walls having the bottom texture on all sides, Chiseled Sandstone having randomized side textures and a new top texture, Cut Sandstone having a new top texture and connecting into a vertical pillar.

requiresefr

Complete Packs.name: Red Sandstone Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
A complete overhaul for Red Sandstone. Includes normal Red Sandstone and its Slabs, Stairs and Walls having the bottom texture on all sides, Chiseled Red Sandstone having randomized side textures and a new top texture, Cut Red Sandstone having a new top texture and connecting into a vertical pillar.

requiresefr

Complete Packs.name: Quartz Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
A complete overhaul for Quartz. Includes normal Quartz and its Slabs and Stairs having the top texture on the bottom aswell, Chiseled Quartz having the Programmer Art lineart, and Quartz Pillars connecting horizontally.

requiresefr

Complete Packs.name: Cactus Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Mixes and rotates the Cactus textures to appear even more random.

overridemaster{Randomized Cactus}

Complete Packs.name: Desaturated Dark Oak Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Desaturates all Dark Oak related textures and randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes small tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also includes the fix for the Trapdoor's side texture. Also includes the rotated Logs.

requiresefr

overridemaster{Desaturated Dark Oak}

Complete Packs.name: Curracabah Acacia Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Changes all Acacia related textures and randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes small tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also includes the fix for the Trapdoor's side texture. Also includes the rotated Logs.

requiresefr

inspiration{[O's Carved Wood](https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/os-carved-wood)}

overridemaster{Curracabah Acacia}

Complete Packs.name: Zombies Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Extreme Hills will have Bouldering Zombies in them. Everywhere else gets a mix of normal Zombies, Lobber Zombies and normal and raggedy player skin Zombies.

overridemaster{Minecraft Earth Zombies}
overridemaster{Player Skin Zombies [1]}
overridemaster{Player Skin Zombies [2]}

Complete Packs.name: Vintage Cherry Complete Pack
Complete Packs.description:
Changes all Cherry related textures and randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes small tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also includes the fix for the Trapdoor's side texture. Also includes the rotated Logs. Also includes the changed Pink Petals.

requiresefr
